review: Roku is better. The Fire TV Stick has to be in line of sight to the router and I can't load Netflix. Wish I would have bought another Roku.
author: Maxwell

review: This gadget is awesome and easy to use.  Highly  recommended.

review: It was easy to set up and really easy to use
